title.rendered: 6 Signs it’s Time to Sell Your Car

content.rendered:
Making the choice to let go of your car and buy a new one can be complicated. For some of us, acting on the need to upgrade our vehicle is slowed by sentimental thoughts and the hassle of shopping. Today, we’ll provide you with six reasons to help you make your decision.

1. Safety

If your vehicle is no longer safe to drive, it’s time to trade it in. Some people look for upgrades after having a new child, but there’s never a bad time to begin driving a car that’s safer for yourself, your passengers, and others on the road.

2. Repair Costs

Consider how many repairs you’ve already made and how many you’ll still need to make in order to have your car fully functional. If the total is comparable to the amount you’d receive from selling it, it’s time to say goodbye.

3. Fuel Efficiency

Many people looking to save money find themselves staring down the amount they spend on gas per month. Many newer vehicles operate at over 50 miles per gallon! That’s a long way to go before making a pit stop.

4. Cosmetic Details

The little scrapes and scratches can really add up! Looks aren’t everything, but many people care about their car looking its best. If your car has several points of exterior damage, staining or rips on the interior, or peeling paint, you may want to upgrade.

5. Emissions

When a car fails its emissions test, it’s on the driver to remedy the situation with repairs or to otherwise get it off the road. Now is a good time to shop for a newer model—including hybrid or electric vehicles—that will be less harmful to the environment.

6. Insurance Costs

If you’re driving an older vehicle, chances are your insurance company is charging you more. Older vehicles have fewer safety features and often require more repair, driving up your insurer’s costs as well as your own.

We Offer Top Cash for Junk Cars in Chicago, Il

No matter what shape your car is in, we’re interested in buying it for cash on the spot. We offer top cash for junk car in Chicago and can even haul your vehicle away if it won’t make the trip! Contact Aero Auto Parts today.
